overview: The owner of a silver mine, having repeatedly been the victim of the Silver Bandit, sends his clerk Spade Cooley who can neither ride nor fight west to investigate. The Sheriff has been unable to catch the bandit but when Spade finds him he will have to both ride and fight to bring him in.
tagline: THE TENDERFOOT DREAMED OF A LIFE OF ADVENTURE...and the SILVER BANDIT MADE HIS DREAMS COME TRUE!
title: The Silver Bandit
